journey.name: Show Error Dialog when no internet connection is available
journey.description: A Journey that tests that Error Dialogs are shown when the user has no internet connection and tries to refresh the data.

actions.action: Put phone in airplane mode to disable internet connections
Pull to refresh the location list
Verify the error dialog mentioning missing internet connection is visible.
Disable airplane mode again and wait until internet connection is available again.
Click the try again button of the error dialog
Verify that the updated location list is shown
